name: Python Developer (Data Science)
description:
About Us

IHS Markit is a global information company that provides expertise, data and solutions to 50,000+ customers helping them in making more informed decisions. Our research and development center in Minsk focuses on creation of three intellectual platforms of IHS Markit related to engineering and manufacturing domains. This includes scalable cognitive engines that help users – engineers, innovators and researchers – to discover and leverage knowledge locked in corporate repositories as well as in industry sources.

Our AI team in Minsk is looking for new talents for the role of Python Developer (Data Science) critical for success of projects related to Natural Language Processing, Data Capturing, Content Understanding and Information Retrieval domains.

Your Role

You will be responsible for design and engineering aspects of innovative projects related to infrastructure and intelligence behind natural language processing, content understanding and enrichment, and/or information retrieval solutions as part of IHS Markit products. Your role is needed to implement intelligent content understanding pipelines to support robust data extraction from unstructured content with application of ML models, as well as to curate all questions related to data life cycle.

Your duties will include all or many of the following:

  • Creating infrastructure and frameworks to deliver results of Data Science team into production including deep learning models, GPU scaling, versioning, CI/CD, integration with various data storage solutions
  • Designing APIs for data processing pipelines focusing on high throughput, stability and flexibility
  • Debugging and testing developed solutions to ensure reliability and high-performance
  • Implementing logging and monitoring solutions for observability and fast troubleshooting
  • Writing effective and scalable python component code, review existing code base
  • Converting Data Science/Machine Learning components to production pipeline systems using the technology stack of commercial ML-platform
  • Taking care of performance and cost of compute of production data processing services
  • Participating in data engineering in projects with Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing, Data Capturing, Computer Vision, Information Retrieval within the broad range of areas
  • Working in the team with data scientists, ML engineers and developers on building the intelligent capabilities into company products with respect to product requirements

About You

You are an experience engineer with skills in data science focused on solutions related to automation of unstructured content processing, who is motivated by complex and fuzzy challenges. Your required qualifications and experience include:

  • Bachelor’s degree in data science, data engineering, math & computer science, statistics or related field
  • 2+ years of production experience in development of data processing pipelines and APIs based on microservices and/or serverless functions with Python stack
  • Strong programming skills — Python
  • Good understanding of principles and concepts of microservices architecture, asynchronous programming, autoscaling
  • Architecture and system design skills
  • Solid skills in algorithms and data structures
  • Experience with projects relevant to production development and deployment of deep learning solutions
  • English language (B1+)

The following will hugely increase our interest:

  • MS or PhD degree in related field
  • Experience in Natural Language Processing or/and Computer Vision
  • Publications in related domain
  • Linux user experience

What we offer

Open and Collaborative Environment:

  • Own product development based on science and technology
  • Personal growth and career development supported on corporate level
  • Support of self-study and research
  • Development of own deep learning architectures
  • Getting custom datasets from the team of professional annotators
  • Training on powerful private GPU cloud
  • Research and application of state-of-art models
  • Development of own unique AI-driven products that work out-of-the-box and loved by world top companies
  • Great colleagues and open atmosphere at workplace
  • Knowledge and discoveries sharing inside and outside the team
  • Collaboration with a great team of ML professionals
  • Participation in international workshops and conferences
  • Continuous education with invited tutors and paid online programs

Employee benefits:

  • English language classes
  • Employee stock options plans
  • Vacation time increase with tenure
  • Extended medical insurance for employees and their families
  • Personal accident coverage
  • Employee assistance program
  • Reimbursement of sports activities
  • Corporate and social events
